abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the Support to
            Oportunidades Project for Mexico are to: increase capacities
            in health, nutrition and education of poor families through
            human capital investment by promoting regular health
            check-ups, improving health status, and raising school
            enrollment and attendance rates; and build sustainable
            connections between Oportunidades and other social programs
            of the Government of Mexico in order to improve health and
            education outcomes for program participants. The
            reallocation is necessary because the Ministry of Finance
            and public credit has withheld the authorization necessary
            for the national coordination of oportunidades to use loan
            resources to cover operating costs. The closing date is
            December 31, 2013.
